show_answers_if_no_winners.tooltip: Show the question's answer(s) if nobody answers the question.

percent_loyalty_point_value_increase_on_.label: % Point Decrease On Correct Answer
percent_loyalty_point_value_increase_on_.tooltip: Future currency reward amount will decrease by this percentage when somebody correctly answers a question. Lowers the value of easy questions.

percent_loyalty_point_value_decrease_on_.tooltip: Future currency reward amount will increase by this percentage when nobody correctly answers a question. Increases the value of hard questions.

enable_file_logging.label: Enable File Logging
